She said as she looked down at her step-mother. "Katie Cat is the mommy now, got it?" Debra looked away disgusted and Alex reached down and tussled her hair like a child. Debra sat back on the couch and pretended to watch the television, but she was rolling the new humiliation around in her head. Her eight year old daughter was now babysitting her. She knew it couldn't be helped and that Alex was actually protecting her by going to do the same thing at the Lang's house, but it still burned her. Katie sat down next to her smiling. Debra knew it was because she was left in charge. Something she'd never been allowed to before. "Now I hope you'll be a good little girl for mommy." Katie picked up the TV remote and clicked it off. She leaned down to meet Debra's eyes. "Is my little girl gonna obey mommy?" Debra looked up annoyed, but more startled by the question. She nodded, her eyes never leaving Katie's big brown ones. The girl smiled and gave her a small kiss on the forehead. "Good girl. I don't want to have to punish you." Again came the mention of punishing her. She'd hoped it was just her daughter role playing.

Katie sat next to her, admiring her new outfit. "You really do look pretty in your new clothes." Debra felt Katie's hand on her thigh and it made her gaze finally break from the giant girl's. The hand started to caress up her outer thigh as it passed under the pleated skirt up to her hip and then back down again. Katie what are you doing?!" The girl giggled watching her mother struggle on her lap. She barely held her and she was helpless against her. "I told ya I was going to punish ya." 1111111111111.content:
Hours later, Alex came home and plopped down in the chair in the living room. She saw Katie watching TV and Debra...was far away in the other chair. Her knees were tightly clenched to her chest as she sat avoiding eye contact. Alex wondered what her problem was but concern was erased when she noticed she could see her little ass and a hint of crotch the way she was sitting. 'Little perv...' she thought to herself. She dug into her shorts pocket and pulled her earnings out. Getting up she walked to the chair Debra was in and started to sit down. Debra seeing the huge form descending finally broke out of her trance and started to get up. Alex put her hands under the little woman's arms and lifted her up and onto her lap as she sat. Debra squirmed a bit unsure of her intentions but soon settled sitting in her step-daughter's lap like a young child. Alex waved the money in Debra's face playfully. "Looks like we have money for more dolly clothes for you, Thumbelina." Alex fidgeted with the little cheerleader skirt and top. "Or maybe not...I love this little outfit." Debra sat and let her play with her clothes. She had had enough of trying to stop giants today. Even when Alex playfully jiggled her ample breasts, she sat cold and still.

Katie glanced at them then back at the TV. She was secretly hoping her mother wouldn't tell Alex what she'd done while she was in charge. But the little woman sat quiet and obedient. "Well, Katie..", Alex started that made the girl jump in guilt, "time for bed, kiddo. It's late." Katie put the remote down and walked by the two in the chair before Alex grabbed her arm. "Don't I get a kiss, Katie cat?" Katie smiled and leaned in for a hug, her eyes locked on Debra's in a silent warning. Katie kissed her sister's cheek and walked up to her room. That left the two alone in the room. Alex began stroking her step-mother's hair as she sat in her lap. She loved how fine and delicate it was at this size. "You going to need help up the stairs, Thumbelina?"

Debra looked down in shame, "No thank you, I'll be fine." Alex giggled a little and then began to bounce the small woman on her knee like a small child as she watched her bosom bounce, definitely NOT like a small child's. Soon Alex got up and Debra slid down her legs to the floor. Alex followed behind as she watched her climb the stairs with her little legs. At the top they separated and went to their rooms. Debra walked to her now enormous bed and climbed on to it. As she lay there she got a sense of vertigo wash over her. Everything was so big it was if she were going to sink into the world and be lost forever. She sat up gasping in anxiety. Sitting in the dark, she looked around her now foreign room and felt alone and vulnerable like she'd never felt before. Every time her eyes adjusted to the dim light she was overcome by the distorted size everything seemed. Almost to tears she got down from her bed and padded out into the hallway. Standing there she fidgeted in place deciding if she should dare ask for help. She walked to Alex's door and knocked on it. Knocking again she heard a muffled grunt and she fidgeted with the door knob before being able to turn it. Entering she saw her step-daughter sprawled on her bed like some giant from a fairy tale. She walked to the edge of the bed, "Alex...?" Another half awake grunt. "Can....would you let me sleep in here?"

This made the teen lift her head and squint at her in the darkened room. "What...?" Alex asked. Her hair already in disarray from sleep.

"I-I can't sleep in my room. I feel so...it's just too much for me..." She fought back tears as she awaited her young protector's decision. If she said no, she didn't want to ask Katie.

Alex let out an annoyed sigh before, "Fine....I guess. You little weirdo.." She repositioned herself with her back to Debra. "Climb up...but just this one time. Got it?" Debra nodded and climbed up next to her. She could feel Alex's massive form behind her. And it made her feel secure and safe. As they lay there eventually Alex turned and faced her small bed companion, startling Debra at first feeling the bed creek and shift under her. Then the little woman felt Alex's giant arm cross over her and pulled her to her. A giant bare leg did the same below. Alex was spooning her to her huge frame. Debra could feel Alex's breath on her neck as the giant teen settled. "Don't read anything into this, Thumbelina..." Alex said quietly. She could feel the slow deep rising of her step-daughter's chest on her back. Alex was warm and soft, hiding her massive size's strength compared to her's. Even if she HAD wanted to not be handled like a body pillow, the young girl's one arm would have forced the issue effortlessly. She wasn't 100% sure Alex knew this, but Debra did. And even though some would be frightened or intimidated by the thought, Debra felt safe and protected. As they both then rested comfortably, she smiled and wrapped her own small arms around Alex's big arm across her. She caught a whiff of faint perfume from Alex that she recognized as her own. The young teen must have raided her room. She felt a tinge of that hyper-sexuality return but she squinted her eyes and fought it back before it faded and she sighed relief and slept.

Morning came and Debra was awake before Alex who was always a late sleeper. Still wrapped in each other, Debra struggled to free herself without waking the giant girl. It was like lifting a soft heavy log off her. Eventually freeing herself, she slid down to the floor....but it seemed a further drop than she remembered. Was she mad? Had she shrunk again?! Her eyes darted around but she wasn't sure judging her size to the furniture around her. She heard Alex grumble as she woke also. Debra heard a long yawn as the teen swung her legs over the edge of her bed and both feet thumped heavily on either sides of her. As Alex stood stretching Debra had noticed she had indeed gotten smaller. Where she had came to Alex's waist she was now a few inches below her knee. It took a moment for Alex's sleepy eyes to adjust and understand anything had changed as she stood over her bed partner with a content smile. A smile that slowly began to fade as she noticed her little step-mother was now knee high. "Wha...but...wha...?!" she stammered. Debra simply looked up wringing her tiny hands in a panic. "Debra....you shrunk!? Again?!" Somewhere in the back of her mind she assumed what happened to her step-mom was a one time thing. She never imagined it was still happening to her. In that moment seeing her now even smaller she realized she may just keep shrinking to nothing. And no matter how much she hated her over bearing step-mom she didn't actually want her to die. She bent down and sat on her knees bringing herself lower to her. She rested a hand on her shoulder to comfort her but just her hand even felt like she was handling a doll now....not a child.

The doll clothes Debra wore were struggling to stay on her smaller frame as her arm crossed over her chest holding the top and her other hand clenching the miniskirt. "I....How is this still happening to me?!" She buried her cheek into Alex's hand that was resting on her shoulder and covering half of her back. As the tiny woman wept Alex fought back her own tears for a woman she just a day ago wanted to be gone....now there might be a chance that might happen.

"Debra....we...we have to tell someone. Someone has to help." Alex blurted out.

Debra had thought telling someone would be an option. That was until she realized doctors and scientists would simply take her away and run god knows how many tests and subject her to who knows what. They'd be less inclined to help her as figure a way to replicate it. "No Alex....people can't know about this." She sensed her about to argue by the troubled look on her face. "They'd just take me away and experiment on me. Please Alex...don't tell anyone..."

"But....", Alex started but the more she thought the more Debra was right. "What are we going to do? We don't even know why you're still....shrinking..." She stood up lost in thought and Debra stepped back in awe for a moment. More people BIGGER than Alex was not an option! "You don't think....it's connected to your....urges do you?" Alex suddenly felt immense guilt. Not only had she abused her lust state but she had Katie play with her, too.

Debra flushed red. "I...I don't know. Maybe? Last night it...came back for a moment but I repressed it."

"Last night....? When I....hugged you?" Alex's guilt again. "Do you think stopping it does this?"

"I don't know.....I did feel weird after it went away." Debra ran the events of the night before in her head.

Alex's guilt lessened. "Wow....that's messed UP!" Alex exclaimed in disbelief. If fulfilling the urges kept it at bay she may have helped her step-mom instead of taking advantage of her.

"If we knew what caused my ....shrinking...we could maybe figure this shit out!" she yelled as she kicked Alex's flip flop on the floor in frustration.

"We're going to need to get you new clothes. That cheerleader outfit is too big now." Debra looked up sheepishly. "Too bad....I liked you in that little get up."

Debra blushed again. "Maybe there's a smaller doll that likes team spirit..." Debra said with a sly grin.

Alex stood above her shocked. "Well look at you...you little ho!" They both laughed. It was Alex who heard movement from downstairs. "Katie must be up. We're going to have to let her know you're smaller." Debra instinctively reached behind her and put a hand on her rear. As they walked down the stairs they saw Katie....but she was talking to someone in the room with her. Debra saw the huge shadow of the other poerson and wrapped an arm around her daughter's leg but was it too late....?!

Creeping down to the hallway overlooking the living room, the tiny mother and towering teenager peeked around and saw Katie talking to someone at the door. They couldn't hear the conversation but Katie saying goodbye and closing the door. Alex darted down the stairs and peered out the front window, but didn't see anyone. Alex turned to her step-sister, who was still rubbing sleep from her eyes. "Katie, who were you talking to?" she asked. Katie grunted and shrugged her shoulders. Obviously she wasn't grasping the severity of someone finding out about their mother. "Katie...?!" Alex insisted.

The youngster looked up annoyed, "I don't KNOW, Alex." she whined. "Some lady looking for mommy. Somebody who said she knew her." Alex stood frozen. "......AND?! Did she say if she was coming back?!" Katie shook her head. "I told her she wasn't home and she left." By this time Debra has managed to descend the stairs and joined her daughters in the living room. Katie glanced down at her and almost did a double take. "Mommy's smaller!" she squealed. Instead of shock and worry, it was shock and glee. Debra stood there clinging her cheerleader top around her shrunken body as both titans looked down at her. "Be careful with her, Katie!" Alex insisted as she reached to take her away. Katie just grunted disapprovingly and held her tight. Debra was struggling to maintain her now too big top and against the giant hand holding her.

"She's gonna need new clothes...," Katie said as she picked at the top making Debra cling to it even more. Katie's eyes widened, "Alex can we go shopping for Barbie clothes?!" Katie walked to the coffee table and set her mother down as she talked to Alex. "I can pick out some little dresses for her!"

"I don't know...that's going to cost money. I'm not sure a cashier is going to let me use Debra's credit cards." Alex could see the disappointment forming on Katie's face. "Plus we're gonna need to save money for a while....until we figure something out."

It wasn't just Katie disappointed but Debra had to admit she was too. She didn't want to keep going around in this over sized top. "Aw come ON Alex!", the youngster pouted stomping her feet making the table shudder and Debra lose her footing. "I don't have any Barbies or clothes," she said as her stare turned angrily to Debra sitting on the table. "because mom never would buy me any."

Sighing, Alex knew she was right. Debra always refused Katie when she asked for Barbies. Claiming they were a waste of money, but then buying more expensive dolls of other kinds. If only she knew her dislike of the doll was going to bite her in her tiny little ass later... "Ok.... we can go to the store and see what they have. Maybe something's on clearance." Katie jumped around in glee. Alex looked down at Debra, "I'm gonna take Katie with me. You going to be Ok till we get back?" Debra looked around at the growing surroundings and nodded sheepishly. Alex smiled and set her down on the floor between their feet. Katie ran upstairs to get dressed as Alex lowered herself to her knees and leaned in close to Debra. "You have any idea who that woman was?"

"None...Anyone I know would have texted before coming over." She looked up at the side table where her over sized phone sat. Alex reached over and grabbed it and checked the messages but found nothing. "Plus Katie knows anyone who would have come over...." she trailed off in worried thought. The aspect of being home alone suddenly made her feel even smaller.

Before long both girls were dressed and ready to leave. Katie ran to her mother who was still in the middle of the floor. "I'm gonna find something so pretty for you!" Debra smiled weakly up at her. Alex wrangled her sister to the door, "Stay out of trouble, Thumbelina." Looking back, "And don't answer the door..." With a smirk she was gone and Debra was alone.

Debra awoke the next morning. Looking down herself she almost, for a moment, had forgotten she was in a dollhouse in her youngest daughter's bedroom. The doll bed was actually very comfortable. Even if the blanket was a bit rough for her taste. Maybe she'd ask Alex to make her one out of something softer. Perhaps the silk nightie that hung in her closet that would never fit her now. The thought made her cringe a bit under the covers. She looked around her room and saw the clearly falseness of it all. The various garish shades of pink everything was molded in. The tacky flower wallpaper trim...the hearts and more flowers that were printed on the curtains. Obviously made for a little girl and not anything a grown adult would choose for their decor.

She decided it was time to get up and leave the comfort of the bed. Pulling back the blanket she swung her legs over the edge of the bed and her feet landed on the floor, making her grin. Looking down herself she was reminded of the Barbie nightie she was dressed in. Again it didn't quite fit right being made for a doll and not a well endowed women with ample curves. The front was held together with a small bit of Velcro, that she'd uncomfortably felt while sleeping. Standing up in her bare feet she padded her way to the window. "Katie...?" she called out. No answer. Shrugging she brought her head back inside her new home.

It was actually a elastic headband with a large lacy bow on it. Effectively turning her naughty outfit into a straight up Playboy Playmate look. Just then she felt and heard the wall to her bedroom scrape and move as someone was opening the room next to her. Then the shadow to fell over the window to the bathroom and the wall began to move also as Debra clung to the sink and bathtub as she remained seated on the toilet. As the wall moved over to one side a giant body leaned down and a strange face filled the place the wall once stood. It was a girl...she vaguely recognized in her shock. It was Katie's friend Piper!

The girl looked in with wide eyes and a huge smile on her face. "Oh my gosh!!" she squealed. Debra now was scrambling off the toilet and backed into the room's far corner. A giant hand entered the bathroom and Debra cringed away from it screaming. She felt a finger touch her back and glide down it before moving away. "It's really her!"

"I told ya," Debra heard Katie's voice. "My mommy is a doll." The shrunken mother looked back out beyond the missing wall and saw Piper and Katie smiling back at her. "Katie! What do you think you're doing?!" She screamed. The two girls giggled.

"She sounds funny!" Piper laughed.

"Let me show you what I was talking about, Piper..." Katie's hand slowly entered the room and her fingers wrapped around Debra. The tiny woman was lifted out of the room and into the air. She twisted and struggled against the hand, kicking her legs in the air and pushing on the fingers and thumb with all her might. Katie just held her as if she were doing nothing at all, though. Piper brought a finger up and stroked her hair as Debra panicked.

"She's so beautiful..." Piper cooed, making Katie look at her funny. Piper looked away ashamed, "I....always thought your mom was pretty." Debra had stopped her struggling as it was beginning to go against her ability to hold in her morning ritual she was in the middle of doing. "It's ok, Piper," Katie said smiling as she put her arm around her friend's shoulder, "She is pretty." They both looked down at her, "Prettiest dolly EVER."

"Alex, can you fill up the tub?" Katie said, having started pulling her off her nightshirt. Behind her, Jenny was helping Zoey with her nightgown.
Alex turned to Debra, then back to Katie "No, let's use the shower. Mom would have to swim in a bath."
Katie giggled at that "That'd be cute." taking off her panties, she walked closer to the sink Debra was on, leaning over a little to look at her mother at face level "she is a good swimmer, you know."
"What did I say?" Alex said, starting to take of her pajamas as well.
"No poking it's mean." Katie answered in a mocking tone.
"Ugh. Just stop being mean, Katie." the titan ten year old turned to Debra "Mom, you undress too." and back to Katie.
Not wanting to upset Alex, so far the only one of the girls trying to be nice to her, Debra tried to pry the pink, glossy tube off herself.
She couldn't. She wasn't strong enough to pry off the rubbery doll's dress.
"A-Alex... I need some help with the dr-HEY!"
Debra was lifted into the air by Zoey, who had snuck up on Debra when she was distracted by her bickering daughters "I'll help!" the girl said, not even waiting for Debra's response, who felt a stubby finger worm in under the skirt, the dress already halfway undone by the time the girl finished her short sentence.
With no effort, despite Debra flailing by reflex, she had undressed her, and was now looking at her with the same curiosity Katie had this morning, and Jenny had numerous times, and Debra was rather thankful that she put her back on the sink without acting on it.
"Aw." Jenny had moved in "I wanted to do that..." her niece bent over, intently staring at her tiny aunt, who turned red and covered herself with her hands, which had no effect on Jenny staring at her.

Thankfully, Jenny's concentration was broken, as the sound of water filled the room.
Alex had climbed into the tub and turned on the shower head.
"Come on, stop wasting time!" Alex said "We'll still need to decide what to do today."
Debra was grabbed by Katie, who didn't lift her up like the others, and just let her hand, with the doll woman in it, hang loose next to her thigh, easily four times as wide as the tiny woman's entire body. "Calm down! We can talk and shower at the same time, you know."
Debra was lifted a little, as Katie climbed into the tub as well, followed by Zoey, helped by Jenny, who then got in herself.
Katie bent down just a little, and let go off her mother, smiling as her tiny mom fell on her ass from the sudden drop. It was subtle enough that Alex didn't even notice.
To Debra, the entire tub shaked every time the girls made even the slightest move. Combined with the rising water, she couldn't possibly keep her footing.
Debra looked up. At the moment, none of the girls paid attention to her, having started talking about staying in for games and movies, or going out for the beach or park.
She felt herself turning red. She had bathed the girls since they were born, and even Jenny and Zoey when she helped out her sister, but something about being 1 foot tall made her feel all helpless, scared, lowly, safe, and ... Wait.
Surely she was just a little thrown off by the girls mistreating her.

Ignoring her thoughts for now, she got herself up on hands and knees, even then just barely keeping balance, and becoming more and more difficult now soap had started to mix with the water, intent on standing or at least sitting up like a proper person, when she was suddenly pushed over.
Katie had turned the shower on her, and was laughing at Debra's struggles against the water.
"Katie." Alex started to sound tired, but Debra wasn't sure if she had it with Katie treating her like this, or just with playing the responsible sibling.
Now on her back, she looked straight up at Zoey and Jenny, both of them looking down, the younger girl laughing like Katie now was, the older girl with an innocent-ish smile, giving her a little wave.
Zoey bent down and picked up Debra, holding her in two hands, and sat down on the floor, Jenny kneeling behind her to help her little sister to wash her hair.
Debra tried to struggle, pressed into the babyfat of Zoey's belly, but gave up when it was obvious it was not going to work.
To Debra, the girls had become forces of nature; to them, the tiny woman wasn't even an real person anymore.

She shouldn't be feeling this at ease about it, Debra thought to herself.
144321221.title: Sharing a shower

choices: I still have to rinse Debra off and myself, turning the water back on.
I will dry Debra off back in the guestroom .
Alex suggests something
More choices
1443212212.content:
As I was now being held by little Zoey and her sister Jenny, I simply let them do what they wanted, it wasn't like I could have done any differently.

Zoey finished washing my long hair and then handed me off to her big sister Jenny.
Jenny got a different look on her face when she held my stretched out body in her hand, laying on my back in her hand, my legs dangling off of her palm and my arms out past her fingers, I let Jenny wash the rest of my body.

Jenny looks up at the other girls before continuing washing me, both Katie and Zoey was playing in the shower together, completely forgetting about me, then Jenny looked up into the face of my eldest daughter Alex and saw that Alex was watching her intently shaking her head yes and then saying " Jenny, make sure Debra is clean everywhere" before turning back to the other girls, helping them wash their bodies
Jenny then turned her attention back to me and I felt her fingers lathering up with soap, .rubbing me all over ... my arms above my head gave free access to Jenny to wash them and my armpits, then she washed my chest and lingered there for quite a bit longer, by this time I am feeling very relaxed and good letting Jenny wash my chest, " I then felt her fingers lower down to my feet and legs, rubbing them in her soapy fingers and then heading upwards to wash my thighs ... I was so nervous as her fingers got closer and closer to my other area, I held my breath and waited for her touch but then Alex called out " alright girls, we are done " and turned off the shower.

I see all the girls step out of the shower one by one leaving Jenny in the shower holding me alone, Jenny then tells Alex ......
1443212212.title: One shower later.

choices: staying in!" (snacks, tv, games, & "games")
going to the park, and later, the beach!"
14432122121.content:
"I still have to rinse Debra off. And myself." Jenny told Alex.
Technically she wasn't lying, she and Debra were still covered in a little soap. Just nothing a towel couldn't take care of.
Alex just shrugged. "Fine, we haven't decide what were going to do anyway..." and walked out of the bathroom, ushering Katie and Zoey, oblivious to the younger girls' jealously staring at Jenny.
Alex closed the door behind her, and Jenny snuck out of the bathtub, rightfully confident that Debra wouldn't be able to climb out of it by herself.
With her ear to the door, she stood there for a while, before slowly backing up to the bath.
Getting back into the tub, she turned on the shower, and eagerly rinsed off Debra and herself as quickly as possible, putting down the shower head behind her, but not turning it off.

Debra, who, without the running water or slippery suds, could actually stand in the tub, looked up at the, to her, 25 foot tall nine year old, who turned back, looking down onto the tiny woman, a big, but still vaguely innocent, smile on her face, her cheeks starting to turn red.
Jenny squatted down, not breaking eye contact with her doll-sized aunt.
Her hand moved towards Debra, it wasn't moving fast, but Debra knew there was no point trying to protest, let alone try and run away.
Holding the tiny woman by the arm, she pulled her closer.
Debra's face turned deep red very quickly, as the girls started squeezing one of her breasts with only a thumb and an index finger.
Looking up at the giant girl, she found her gaze firmly fixated on Debra's chest, her face turning slightly red, and her eyes darting away so now and then.
She wasn't just innocently curious; she knew what she was doing was wrong.
Debra started to worry about how far Jenny would go, but her concentration was broken, and she let out a soft yelp, as the hand that had been holding her arm had moved behind her and pinched her, thankfully less sore, butt.

The tiny woman let out another little yell, as she was lifted up, a single hand wrapped around her waist like the doll she was, as Jenny sat down in the tub, legs stretched out in front of her, and laid Debra on her lap, head by her knees.
Remembering Jenny washing her, Debra did the only thing she could; close her eyes and just endure being molested by her niece.
It didn't go as fast as Debra had feared, as Jenny ran her hands over the tiny woman's legs first, and the first touch that made Debra flinch in reflex was the girl kneading her thighs.
Debra was turned over on her stomach, again, only one hand was all it took, and felt a single finger run down her back, over her behind, all the way down to her calves, then back again, and then lift away.

Hoping the girl understood right from wrong well enough, or at least had her curiosity satisfied, Debra felt herself falling a little, before being pressured between two fleshy walls, and things went mostly dark.
In front of her, the white floor of the tub was all Debra could see.
Jenny had Debra's head and upper body clamped between her thighs, with her ass sticking straight up.
The finger returned, this time circling her buttocks, before she felt a hand hold each thigh, and move them apart.
Now starting to panic more proactively, Debra tried to close them, but had to face defeat against the giant hands.
Admitting defeat, she let her legs drop, her knees now resting on the girls legs.

One hand let go, the other still holding onto the tiny woman's leg, the loose grip utterly unbreakable to Debra, who felt the finger return on the inside of her thighs.
And move up.
While the arm-sized finger did run around Debra's lower lips, she counted her blessing as the girl got distracted by the tiny woman's bush.
Feeling her leg being lifted up, the other loosely dangling in defeat, Debra would've been hanging upside down if she wasn't still caught between the girls legs.
Instead, she was basically folded double, hopeful that the girl wouldn't push her back any further.
She felt the finger run through her pubic hair, and winced when she felt what, to the girl, must've been just a curious little pluck.
The girls thighs let go, Debra now dangling upside down, looking straight between Jenny's legs, thankful that she was all the way over to the girls knees, as Jenny was examining herself, Debra guessing she was wondering when she'd grow her own maidenhair.
Debra started to feel a little dread, as Jenny shrugged and returned her attention to the living doll that was her aunt.

A knock on the door, which started to open immediately after, and Debra was dropped, as Jenny quickly scrambled to grab the shower head, and before she could recover, Debra was doused by the water again.
Alex walked in, dressed in a yellow t-shirt and blue jean shorts. "You done? Cause we have decided what we're going to do today."
"Y- yes." Jenny heckled, pretending to relax under the hot water. Her eyes staring at Debra, seeming to both begging and threatening her not to speak.
"Good. Oh! And we found some doll clothes mom could wear. Figured you'd like to help pick some out." Alex said, on the way out. She hadn't even acknowledged Debra was there.

Jenny seemed to curse under her breath, as Alex hadn't closed the door when she left.
The girl sighed, turned off the shower, and, picking up Debra, got out of the tub.
She set her down next to the sink, picked up a towel, giving a washcloth to Debra, and started drying herself.
Debra followed suit. She didn't speak, now scared of the girl who, so far, had been nothing but nice to her.
Trying to bolster her own confidence, she told herself the girl was just curious. And with Debra's small size, she just had trouble relating to her.
Having dried herself, Jenny wrapped the towel around her, and, as she leaned in to pick up Debra, broke the silence.
"Next time." Jenny seemed to whisper to herself.
Debra wasn't sure if she was intentionally threatening, but was now seriously doubting the girl's motives.

Feeling a knot in her stomach, the washcloth was taken away and tossed on the pile of laundry, a naked Debra picked up.
Making a short stop at the guest room, Jenny put down Debra on her bed, and opened her suitcase, and threw on a green shirt and blue jumper dress.
She picked up the still naked, and kind of cold, Debra, and moved to the living room, starting to stroke Debra's hair on the way.
Greeted by Alex, who took over Debra, again having her precariously seated in a cupped hand, who showed them to Katie, wearing gray sweatshirt and -pants, and Zoey, wearing a whita and pink dress.

Alex put down her mother on the ground and turned to Jenny.
"I'm going to get things ready, you go help them pick out an outfit for mom." Alex already started walking out of the room, raising her voice a little to make herself heard from the hallway "Make sure it's comfy! Were -
14432122121.title: Curious Jenny

choices: Zoey, wanting to play dolls with Debra. As the doll.
Katie, deciding it's her turn for alone time with Debra.
144321221211.content:
The next ten minutes, the girls handled, passed around, dressed, and undressed Debra, with the ease of playing dress-up with a doll.
Not that Debra even tried to resist, after all that happened since waking up this morning had proven she wasn't in control of her own life anymore.
While Katie, Jenny, and Zoey were dressing up Debra, Alex was walking up and down from the girls' rooms to the living, bringing with her DVDs and video games to the big screen TV in the room, and eventually snacks and soda from the kitchen, before casually dropping down on the couch, feet on the table, bag of chips in hand, remote in the other, satisfied with herself.
Meanwhile, the girls had decided to put Debra in some sort of frilly sundress, and only the sundress; plastic shoes and hats didn't fit, and there wasn't any doll underwear in the toy-box.
Again carried by Jenny, who sat down on the couch, next to Alex, and Debra was sat down on the girl's giant knee.
The whole couch shook up, at least, for the eleven inch woman, when Zoey jumped on the couch, lying on her stomach, her chin resting on her hands as she was staring at Debra with a ears-wide smile.
Katie had gotten a beanbag from her room, and was lounging next to the couch on Alex's side, having claimed her favorite snacks and drinks for herself.

As Alex turned on some movie Debra didn't care about, she suddenly felt many, quick, painful pulling strokes of her hair.
Zoey had started brushing her hair with a a doll's plastic brush, which obviously isn't made for actual use.
"Zoey, please stop." Debra said, half hearted, but to her surprise, the girl actually did stop, though she was visibly confused as to why.
She looked up a little though, as Jenny had started stroking Debra's hair.
Looking up, Debra could only barely see it, but the older niece was staring at her and smiling with a deepening blush on her face.
She had started to hum and was holding Debra increasingly tight against her body, and had started stroking Debra's face along with her hair, oblivious she was drawing attention from the other girls.

"Jenny?" Alex said, drawing Jenny's attention, whose face turned a little more red as she looked up, but Alex didn't finish talking, not sure what to even ask.
"I- eh- I think your mom's cute..." Jenny stammered, getting yet a little redder. "Like, really cute..."
For almost a minute, Alex and Zoey were just staring at Jenny, at a loss for words, when the sound of the TV changed.
Katie had grabbed the remote control and had rewound the movie to presumable before Jenny drew their attention.
"... What?" she said, the attention now on her "Jen think mini-mom is cute. She is. Can we watch the movie now?"
"... Okay... " Alex said, a little stumped, before returning her attention to Jenny. "So... Would you -" "Can I keep Debra tonight? Like, you know, a teddy bear?"
Jenny interrupted Alex, Debra felt the girl's finger cover her mouth, and Debra took the hint, not wanting to anger the little girl over 20 feet, to her, in height.
"Well-" Alex stared "Fine, but don't hog her all the time." Katie spoke in Alex's turn. "We think she's cute too."
"Fine. But, yeah, don't keep her for yourself." Alex said, visibly annoyed by Katie again, but not enough to chastise her again, before returning to the movie, leaving Debra, literally and figuratively, in the hands of Jenny, who leaned forward giving a great, big, Debra smothering, hug to Alex. "THANK YOU!"
Returning to her position, she lifted and turned Debra around, now smiling with an open face, pulling the tiny woman closer to her, and essentially swallowed her face giving her a big smack, before laying her down on her lap, giving Debra some flashbacks to the bath from an hour ago.
As Jenny put her feet on the salon table, giving Debra some more room to stretch, and gradually went from stroking her hair to petting her from head to toe as the movie went on.

Sometime later, the movie was done, and the girls took some time not wanting to get up to do something else.
Alex got up first, walking to the TV, and held up some cartoony-looking go-carting game "Anyone want to race?"
"I do!" Jenny said, shaking up Debra, before she looked down on the little woman. "But I don't..."
"You've got her for tonight! Share her already!" Katie said, having gotten up from her beanbag with great reluctance.
"She's not a toy." Alex corrected Katie, sounding more and more disinterested in playing responsible sibling.
"YOU don't even believe yourself!" Katie said, causing Alex to sigh, while walking to the kitchen. Debra couldn't see what she was doing, but she heard the fridge open.
Zoey had gotten up and had started putting the doll-clothes back in the box, and threw in the barbie doll Katie had used to measure Debra's new height at the end.
"Katie! The dollhouse is in your room, right?" Zoey yelled to the kitchen.
"Yep." Katie answered. Debra heard the fridge door close.
Meanwhile, Jenny had put Debra on the couch after giving her another face-consuming kiss, and moved more to the center of the couch, as Alex sat down next to her and handed Jenny a controller, her pint sized mother in between them
"Can I play with your dolls?!" Zoey continued, still yelling into the kitchen.
"Sure!"
"Want to join?"
"Nah." Katie had entered the living room again, holding a tall bottle of cola, a plastic cup, and another bag of chips. "Soooo... I'm claiming mom's room."
A short silence followed.
"Not policing me?" Katie said, sounding a little surprised.
"Mom's not going to use it anymore, so, no." Alex said, engrossed to her video game.
Katie just shrugged, and returned to business.

Now on her own, Debra just decided to just sit down on the couch.
Her phone was in her (old?) room, but she was sure Katie wouldn't let her touch it, and Katie hadn't been that nice to her so far in general, and especially without Alex to look after her, avoiding her would probably be the smarter move.
She was sure she remembered the password to Katie's laptop, but no way Zoey wouldn't play with her, especially already intent on playing dolls that are Debra sized, and even though she was the youngest, even Zoey would know that Debra calling for help would mean the end of their fun.
The most pleasant option she could think of, at least until Katie and Zoey leave the room, was to just sit here next to
Then, of course, a shadow fell over her, she felt fingers wrap around her waist, followed by Alex and Jenny telling _ to get out off their view of the screen, and she was lifted up in the air by _
144321221211.title: Staying In

choices: She eats Debra's "dinner" herself. Zoey's being impatient.
She let's Debra finish her "dinner". Zoey's playing nice.
1443212212111.content:
Lifted into the air, Debra was casually dropped into the box of doll clothes, next to the barbie doll, the frozen plastic smile seeming to be mocking her.
As Zoey turned around and started walking towards Katie's room, with a notable spring in her steps, the tiny woman in the box was shaken by the young girl's movement, the unstable pile of clothing beneath her wobbling from side to side, Katie in front of them, on her merry way to what was Debra's room.
Debra wasn't exactly looking forward to being played with by Zoey, who had joined Katie in spanking her, and seemed to consider her nothing more than a toy now.
Hopefully she didn't have Jenny's... curiosity...

Debra was shaken from side to side a little more violently as Zoey came to a sudden halt, burying the little woman's face in plastic clothes.
With a little effort, Debra managed to roll on her back to see what was going on.
In the hallway, away from the view of Alex, Katie had turned around.
Leaning forward, Debra saw Katie's finger, almost the length of her own arm, move in and somewhat painfully poke her on the chest, a little awkward with all the stuff she was holding, but intimidating enough for the doll-sized woman to give her her full attention.
"You, quiet." Katie said to her mini-mom, turning her attention to Zoey instead.
"Mom has to do what you say. If she doesn't, punish her or something; You are the boss."
Katie sounded serious and amused in equal measure, and, as Zoey just nodded, mildly confused, but smiling a little wider, turned around and resumed walking, stopping right before the doorframe, and turned her head back at Zoey again.
"Oh! And keep the door closed so she doesn't run away. And so Alex won't hear you and come spoil the fun."
With that, Katie turned around, walked into her new room, and and closed the door with a hip-check.
After both Debra and Zeoy stood there for a second, the shaking resumed as the girl continued on her way to Katie's "old" room.
Entering the room, Debra's world slanted sideways, as Zoey let go of the box with one hand to close the door.
The rest of the,thankfully brief, journey was a little bit frightening to Debra, who was still being shaken on top of being off balance, as Zoey didn't bother to grab the box with two hands again.

A loud slam, which was probably only a small thud to the girl, and a little quake signaled that Debra had arrived at her destination, and the shock of the fall "launched" the barbie doll on top of the tiny woman, now face to face with the six-foot plastic blonde, a little giggle from Zoey revealing this hadn't gone unnoticed.
"Kiss!" the girls said, lightly pressing her index finger down the doll, just as Debra tried to push it off of her, completely overpowered by four year old Zoey's gentle push.
Thankfully for Debra, it seemed to be just a "little" joke, as Zoey didn't stick to it, and actually lifted the doll off of her tiny aunt.
Stepping over the box, giving Debra a view of her pink unicorn print panties, the almost 20 feet girl stepped over to Katie's dollhouse, fiddling something with the doll, before putting it in to the 3 story plastic house, that was actually 3 stories tall to Debra, before turning around, and tossing the doll's pink, glittery dress into the box, then bending over to pick up Debra.
Like Jenny had done, she gave her tiny aunt a face-consuming kiss, and then casually removed the dress with considerably less effort than putting it on her had been.
Debra felt her face turn red, and started feeling somewhat nervous, as Zoey did seem to have Jenny's curiosity, turning, feeling up, and staring at the helpless, naked, tiny woman, though Zoey was, to Debra's relief, less interested than her older sister had been, and turned her attention back to the dollhouse in less than a minute.

With no effort at all, the girl placed Debra on the nightstand next to the toy house. "Stay." she said, pointing down as if Debra was a pet.
Not wanting to push her luck, especially after Katie's speech, Debra sat down on the cold "ground", nest to a digital clock, and a lamp she was sure was taller than she was.
Watching in silence, she saw her giant niece walk towards some other boxes, just like the one she was just in, and opened up a few.
The boxes were full of doll-accessories and spare dolls, collected by both Alex and Katie.
Zoey turned around and walked back to Debra, holding a toy car, and sporting a great big smile.
Putting the life size vehicle next to the tiny woman, she turned around again, this time back to the clothes box, and returned with spandex-shorts and a pink tube top.
Roughly putting Debra in it, she put her behind the wheel of the car, picked up the car, a scare to Debra, who was sitting on the smooth plastic with no seat-belt, the shorts giving only a very small amount of traction, and put it on the ground.
And then she started playing.

Far worse than the clothes box, the tiny Debra held on for dear life, gripping the purely decorative plastic steering wheel, as the car was "driven" all across the floor of the room, Zoey making vroom noises as she pushed it forward, occasionally broken up by laughing as Debra was tossed around and sliding side to side on the plastic seats, the little girl walking and crouching across the room more than simulating the full speed of a car for Debra.
She didn't even appear to think of some play scenario; she seemed to just amuse herself by humiliating and scaring Debra.
Her suspicions seemed to be confirmed as Zoey intentinally crashed the car into the leg of Katie's bed, Debra letting out a shrill, panicky scream, causing the girl to break out into a small laughing fit, as Debra was launched a whole four inch into the air and landed on top of the hood of the car.
Debra felt Zoey's fingers wrap around her waist, and was hovered above the seat of the car, before just being lifted into the air as Zoey, still laughing a little, stood up.
Walking back to the dollhouse, the girl stood still for a while, before putting Debra on the bottom floor.

Debra was in the "bed room" of the dollhouse.
No doubt it could, on Zoey's whim, become anything else by just taking out the bed, a thought that she apparently shared with her niece, as she picked up the doll-sized double-bed, and replaced it with a toy stove, before adding a plastic fridge, and some more kitchen things.
What followed were two prodding hands carelessly, and view blocked by the house, awkwardly, worming Debra into a frilly apron.
"We are gonna play house!" Zoey said, having finally stopped laughing (out loud), pushing a plastic spatula and frying pan (with a sunny-side-up sticker in it) into Debra's hands. "Go cook!" with a single finger, she almost knocked over Debra, pushing her towards the stove.
Afraid of what Zoey might do otherwise, she pretended to go and cook something.
Outside the dollhouse, she placed a toy table and one chair on the ground, setting one plastic cup and plate on the chair side, before standing up and walking towards the door, turning to her tiny aunt "I'll be right back." with that she left the room, closing the door behind her.
In the distance (which she realized was probably just one room over), she heard a doors, and faint laughing.

A few minutes went by.
Not pretending to cook the whole time, no way Zoey'd notice, but Debra didn't dare leave the dollhouse, afraid Zoey might return at just the wrong moment.
Eventually the door did open, and Debra, caught off guard just when she was starting to calm down a little, quickly and panicky returned to pretending to cook.
"Honey I'm home!" Zoey said, followed by the sound of the door closing behind her.
The girl's words resounded in Debra's head; we are gonna play house.
Deciding just to roll with it, Debra took a chance and stepped out of the dollhouse, and, pinching the edges of her apron, made a little curtsey.
"Welcome home!" she said, with her best fake smile on her face. She then noticed why it took so long.

Zoey had put on a white blouse, and matching blue skirt and blazer, all Debra's, all obviously way too big for the four year old girl.
On top of that, she was wearing a pair of black socks, which Debra assumed were hers (they fitted, for one), and was holding one of Debra's briefcases, overstuffed with somethings.
And finally, she was wearing red lipstick, blush, mascara, and a pearl necklace, all from Debra's formal wear, none of which should have been in reach for her only 3 foot niece.
Debra realized that the laughing she had heard was probably Katie, after Zoey asked her for the clothes and telling her what they were playing, who must've decided to either be nice to Zoey, and/or humiliate Debra some more.
Zoey walked up to the table, and plopped down on her butt, her right foot reaching to next of the "kitchen" and her left into the room next to it.
She quickly picked up Debra, and gave her another kiss, covering her face with a thin layer of lipstick.
Opening the briefcase, Zoey took out a small saucer, putting it on the table for herself, followed by a plastic cup, putting it besides the table, easily reaching up to Debra's waist.
In the bag, she could see Zoey's dress and panties, as the girl took out a can of soda, filling her cup, then dunking Debra's toy mug into it.
She took out a small bag of gummies, opened it, and handed it to Debra, who had to drag it with two hands, put some along the saucer, and one on the toy plate.
Zoey quickly scarfed down the candies, as Debra took a while to even put a dent in her single piece.
Followed by a loud belch after downing the cup of cola, Zoey returned her attention to Debra, obviously a little annoyed by Debra taking so long...
1443212212111.title: Playing dolls with Zoey

choices: dread. This won't be fun. For Debra.
dizzy. She's shrinking again.
14432122121111.content:
Fearing the wrath of the 18 foot four year old, Debra tried her best to eat the dinner sized gummy, but not too keen on resuming being a toy, she at very slowly.
Zoey was visibly getting impatient and irritated as Debra bought time, and eventually she sat up.
Elbows on her knees, chin on her palms, she started puffing her cheeks and tapping her feet, now right next to Debra, an increasingly intense glare staring down at the tiny woman.
She had barely eaten past the skin on one corner, but it was too close to breakfast, and Debra was getting full, and the intimidating 'pounding' of Zoey's feet definitely wasn't helping her appetite.
That, and the gummy was easily the size of a cinder block to her.
In cold sweat, Debra was thinking about what to do.
She could keep eating, slowly, and hope enough time to go by for Jenny or Alex to come by, but she'd risk angering Zoey.
She could admit she couldn't eat anymore, but surely the playing would resume.
Zoey wasn't as mean as Katie or as ... handsy... as Jenny, but so far she was not making a good impression either...
Maybe she could-

<b>"ENOUGH!"</b> Zoey broke the silence, sounding more intimidating her tiny aunt than she probably intended. Hopefully.
The girl stood up, towering over Debra, and bent over, reaching down with both hands, and picked up the doll woman in one hand, her arms painfully clamped to her sides, and the gummy in the other hand, between thumb and index finger.
Debra didn't even twitch or yell. Aside from <i>slowly</i> getting used to being treated like this, she was just too scared.

Turning Debra to face her, she put the gummy in her mouth, briefly opening up to give Debra a good look, then simply swallowed (briefly impressing Debra, before remembering the candy wasn't huge, she was just small), and opened her mouth again, showing Debra the now empty orifice, lined with two incomplete rows of pearly whites as big as tusks to her.
The maw closed, and Debra's attention returned to the angry face of her niece.

info.description:
Debra, a mother of two, finds herself shrunk to half her size on morning. Trying to cope and losing control...in more ways than one. How small will she get?

Characters:

Debra: Main character. Above average figure. Widow and mother to two girls. I have an idea on how she is shrinking but I will leave an opening for other people's choice. I'd prefer her shrinking to mildly slow. As in she has some scenarios in each height before she shrinks again. She's starting out at half her height but the size loss afterwards can be varied.

Alex: Debra's step-daughter from her deceased husband's first marriage. She's fifteen and they don't get along at all. Alex falsely blames her for her biological parents getting divorced. She's rebellious and will use this crisis to her own manipulative advantage. She's blond with a fit figure from dance class and cheerleading. Mentally I envisioned her in the likeness and name sake of the character Alex from Paranormal Activity 4 played by Kathryn Newton.

Katie: Debra's daughter from her marriage to Alex's father. She's eight years old and is playful and curious. She looks at the current situation as having a new play friend her own height, even if Debra is shorter by a head. She loves her mother and gets along well with her step-sister. Although she begins to become jealous of the time her fascinating new little mommy is being monopolized by Alex, and wants time with her for herself. Her innocence blinds her to most of the innuendo from her big sister, but not for very long...

There will be more family added later. Alex's actual mother for one. Possibly a boyfriend of Alex's. Maybe some of Katie's friends from school. As the story is early I'm not sure of anything yet.
